mapper.select: SELECT s.board_no suggestNo ,s.suggest_status suggestStatus ,b.board_title suggestTitle ,b.member_id memberId ,s.suggest_secret suggestSecret ,b.board_create_date suggestCreateDate ,s.root root FROM suggest s INNER JOIN board b ON s.board_no = b.board_no WHERE b.board_blind = 'N' ORDER BY IF(ISNULL(s.root),s.board_no,s.root) DESC, s.board_no ASC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT s.board_no suggestNo ,s.suggest_status suggestStatus ,b.board_title suggestTitle ,b.board_content suggestContent ,s.suggest_secret suggestSecret ,b.member_id memberId ,b.board_create_date suggestCreateDate FROM suggest s INNER JOIN board b ON s.board_no = b.board_no WHERE s.suggest_status ='답변전' ORDER BY b.board_create_date ASC LIMIT #{rootNullBeginRow}, #{rootNullRowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM suggest s INNER JOIN board b ON s.board_no = b.board_no WHERE b.board_blind = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM suggest s INNER JOIN board b ON s.board_no = b.board_no WHERE s.suggest_status = '답변전' AND b.board_blind = 'N'

SELECT s.board_no suggestNo ,b.board_title suggestTitle ,b.board_content suggestContent ,b.member_id memberId ,b.board_privilege suggestPrivilege ,b.board_create_date suggestCreateDate ,b.board_update_date suggestUpdateDate ,s.root ,s.suggest_secret suggestSecret ,s.suggest_status suggestStatus FROM suggest s INNER JOIN board b ON s.board_no = b.board_no WHERE b.board_privilege = '4' AND b.board_blind = 'N' AND s.board_no = #{suggestNo}
